nodes.text: The Citadel of Light was an ancient fortress on the planet Bray. During the Clone Wars, it was home to Lord Ravna, who began to infect and convert members of the native Brayan population. Count Dooku also resided in the Citadel, planning to use Ravna's powers to help the Confederacy of Independent Systems win the war. The Citadel was destroyed after Jedi Masters Obi-Wan Kenobi and Adi Gallia visited the planet and discovered Ravna's presence.
